model Post {
  fields {
    title Text
    publishedAt Date?
  }

  operations {
    create createPost() with (title, publishedAt?)
    update updatePostTitle(id) with(title)
    list listPosts(from: Date, to: Date) {
      @where(post.publishedAt >= from and post.publishedAt <= to)
    }
  }
}

===

export interface CreatePostInput {
  title: string
  publishedAt?: Date
}

export interface UpdatePostTitleInput {
  where: {
    id: string
  }

  values: {
    title: string
  }
}
export interface ListPostsInput {
  // todo
}
